mapper.select:
select
substring_index(substring_index(adress,',',2),',',-1) province,
substring_index(adress,',',1) province,
sum((select count(0) from dhlk_light_led l where l.tenant_id=t.id)) count from dhlk_basic_tenant t where t.status=0
and substring_index(adress,',',1) =#{province}
group by
substring_index(substring_index(adress,',',2),',',-1)
substring_index(adress,',',1)

SELECT IFNULL(t1.energySum,0) - IFNULL(t2.energySum, 0 ) AS energy, t1.name FROM (
SELECT p.tenant_id, t.name,
( IFNULL( SUM( led_count ), 0 ) * IFNULL( sum( led_power ), 0 ) * IFNULL(sum( led_opentime),0) * ${dayNum} ) / 1000 AS energySum
FROM dhlk_light_original_power p join dhlk_basic_tenant t on p.tenant_id = t.id where t.status=0
AND substring_index(t.adress,',',1)=#{province}
GROUP BY p.tenant_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN (
SELECT c.tenant_id, SUM(IFNULL( c.energy,0) )energySum FROM dhlk_light_led_power c WHERE
PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( NOW( ), '%Y%m' ), date_format( c.create_time, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1 GROUP BY c.tenant_id) t2 ON t1.tenant_id = t2.tenant_id ORDER BY energy DESC LIMIT ${limit}
select DATEDIFF(max(create_time) ,min(create_time)) as runDays from dhlk_light_led_power

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( t.energySum )/1000,0) AS energy FROM ( SELECT ( IFNULL( SUM( led_count ), 0 ) * IFNULL( SUM( led_power ), 0 ) * IFNULL( SUM( led_opentime ), 0 ) ) * #{runDays} AS energySum FROM dhlk_light_original_power where 1 =1
and tenant_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY tenant_id ) t
